name: soundboard-listener
description: socket.io listener app to pick up soundboard events and play sound on local machine.

scripts.build-server:windows: tsc src/main.ts --outDir dist && nexe dist/main.js -t 16.0.0 -o soundboard-listener.exe --build --verbose
scripts.build-manifest-builder:windows: tsc src/build-manifest.ts --outDir dist && nexe dist/build-manifest.js -t 16.0.0 -o build-manifest.exe --build --verbose

author: Mike D Sharp
